metadata.title: CVE-2011-3740 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - low
metadata.description: FrontAccounting 2.3.1 allows remote attackers to obtain sensitiveinformation via a direct request to a .php file, which reveals theinstallation path in an error message, as demonstrated byreporting/includes/fpdi/fpdi2tcpdf_bridge.php and certain other files.

criterions.comment: libfpdi-php: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
